name: @bot-whatsapp/root
description: Bot de wahtsapp open source para MVP o peque√±os negocios

scripts.build:portal-web: cd ./packages/portal/ && pnpm run build.types && pnpm run build.client && pnpm run build.server && pnpm run lint --fix
scripts.build:full: pnpm run build:portal-web && pnpm run cli:rollup && pnpm run bot:rollup && pnpm run provider:rollup && pnpm run database:rollup && pnpm run contexts:rollup && pnpm run create-bot-whatsapp:rollup && pnpm run portal:rollup
